name: Investigation
description: Represents the aggregated state of an investigation such as categorization, severity, and status. Can be expanded to include analyst assignment details and more.

children.name: priority
children.description: Priority that is assigned to a Case or Alert.

children.name: reason
children.description: Reason for closing an Alert or Case in the SOAR product.

children.name: reputation
children.description: Categorization options for the usefulness of a Finding.

children.name: risk_score
children.description: Risk score for a finding set by an analyst.

children.name: root_cause
children.description: Root cause of the Alert or Finding set by analyst.

children.name: severity_score
children.description: Severity score for a finding set by an analyst.

children.name: verdict
children.description: Categorization options for the validity of a Finding (i.e. whether it reflects an actual security incident).
